name: Baldore.
description:
(VERY UNFINISHED, 0.0.0 IS THE VERSION)

A  Horror game based off of 90's educational games! but, this is a Baldi's Basics Fangame! Play Baldi's Basics before playing this, please do.

Story: You've just did moved to a new school! but there is a mean teacher in your way! so you had to do maths, but don't let him fool you, he may be EVIL. maybe not? hmmm.
